about.title: About me
about.description: Hello! I'm Devaeterne, an experienced Full Stack Developer with expertise in Next.js, React, .NET Core, MVC, MSSQL, and API development. I provide scalable, high-performance solutions with seamless integration of front-end and back-end technologies. With extensive experience in building e-commerce platforms, corporate websites, mobile-friendly applications, and custom software solutions, I can handle a wide range of projects. Additionally, I’m skilled in CMS platforms such as WordPress, OpenCart, Shopify, and Wix, ensuring efficient management of various types of projects. I use the best technologies to create secure, fast, and user-friendly digital experiences, both on the server side and the client side. I’m here to deliver tailored solutions and represent your business in the digital world in the best possible way.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: I'm a professional web developer specializing in React, Next.js, .NET Core, and MVC. I create modern, user-friendly, and SEO-optimized web applications, including e-commerce platforms and corporate websites. My focus is on fast performance, scalability, and responsive design. Let me help you build a digital presence tailored to your needs!

services.title: Data Mining
services.description: I offering professional data mining services using Python. I specialize in analyzing complex datasets to extract insights and support strategic decisions. Using tools like Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-learn, I handle data cleaning, processing, modeling, and visualization to deliver tailored, data-driven solutions. Let’s unlock the power of your data!

services.title: IT Consulting
services.description: I provide IT consulting with expertise in Windows and Linux servers. I’m highly skilled in Plesk and cPanel management, ensuring seamless server operations. Additionally, I offer hosting and domain services to meet your business needs. Let me assist you with reliable solutions to optimize your IT infrastructure and online presence!

services.title: CMS-based Development
services.description: I specialize in creating and customizing websites using WordPress, OpenCart, Shopify, and Wix. Whether you need an e-commerce store, a corporate website, or a personal blog, I can deliver solutions tailored to your needs. From design to functionality, I ensure your site is modern, responsive, and fully optimized. Let’s bring your vision to life!
